Hi there:

I'm about to build a whole accounting solution for small and medium enterprises.

Should I use Prism?, Is Prism targetted for large applications only?, My solution wil target small Businesses, but I still think that Prism will bring me many benefits, I'm I right?

The biggest thing I've seen the developers stress. You can use all of prism, or just pieces.

My company found prism towards the end of a project and I used some of their commanding stuff in a control we used. On learning prism this past month I can say their is a learning curve but after understanding MEF and the basics of composite applications it really is a great way to develop an application. I think small or large. Though the benefits are probably clearer on a large multi developer application.

Thank you for answering.

Is there a way to mark your answer like many other forums?
